metadata.Title: CVE-2014-2686 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
Ansible prior to 1.5.4 mishandles the evaluation of some strings.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-2686` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ansible - 2.0.0.2-2
ansible-fireball - 2.0.0.2-2
ansible-node-fireball - 2.0.0.2-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: ansible package in esm-apps/xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.0.2-2').
